lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The magnitude of the September decline was a result of changes in investors' perceptions of fundamental economic conditions, rather than artifical forces arising from index-related trading strategies," the report said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The SEC staff concluded its study "does not provide an independent basis to conclude that radical regulatory or structural changes are necessary at this time."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The report said "the dramatic growth in the size and institutional use of index products requires continued careful analysis of the potential for disruption of the stock market as well as manipulative or other inappropriate trading in the index products and their component stocks."
